sentences.en: As she spoke rather loudly we could not help but overhear what she said.
sentences.cn: 因为她拉开嗓门说话,所以我们不免听到她的话.

sentences.en: Go to Game room and overhear the Doctor and Judge's discussion.
sentences.cn: Gameroom游戏 室-去游戏室偷听法官和医生的讨论.

sentences.en: Gust could not overhear what passed between them.
sentences.cn: 阵风什么不能偷听通过它们之间.

sentences.en: I chanced to overhear them talking about you.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧听到他们在谈论你.

sentences.en: I couldn’t help overhearing your argument.
sentences.cn: 我无意中听到了你们的争吵。

sentences.en: I happened to overhear what he said.
I managed to overhear a few interesting snippets of information.
sentences.cn: 我设法偷听到一点零星有趣的消息.

sentences.en: I overheard part of their conversation.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧听到了他们谈话的部分内容。

sentences.en: Oberon: But who comes here? I am invisible. And I overhear their conference.
sentences.cn: 可是谁到这儿来啦? 他们看不见我,让我听一听他们说些什麽.

sentences.en: Oberon: But who comes here? I am invisible. And I will overhear their conference.
sentences.cn: 可是谁到这儿来啦? 他们看不见我, 让我听一听他们说些什么.

sentences.en: Pay attention to overhear our talk!
sentences.cn: 注意,有人在偷听咱们的谈话!

sentences.en: The door is shut so that no one may overhear what is said.
sentences.cn: 门关着，这样没人能听见说话的内容。

sentences.en: They stepped aside so that their child could not overhear their conversation.
sentences.cn: 他们走到一边去,不让孩子听见他们的谈话.

sentences.en: They were standing near enough for us to overhear their conversation.
sentences.cn: 他们站得离我们很近,我们能听到他们的谈话.

sentences.en: We overhear the president in mid - conversation.
sentences.cn: 我们听到布什总统正在和人讲话.

words.tran_cn: 无意中听到,偶然听到,偷听

trans.tran_en: to accidentally hear what other people are saying, when they do not know that you have heard

trans.tran_cn: 偶然听到，无意中听到，偷听
trans.tran_en: to accidentally hear what other people are saying, when they do not know that you have heard
